body:
Our `openmc` package points to https://github.com/ANL-CESAR/openmc, which is " 5 commits ahead, 5035 commits behind mit-crpg:develop." 

So I guess, `openmc` needs an update or needs to be purged.

Also looking at the size, I am not sure if `openmc` is a proxy app anymore.

/cc @paulromano @shikhar413
title: openmc: needs an update
